description: Bundle size limits in MB (gzipped). Adjust values based on your project requirements.

notes.web: Web bundles should typically be < 1MB gzipped for good performance
notes.mobile: Mobile bundles can be slightly larger (< 2MB) but should remain minimal
notes.game: Game builds are typically much larger (< 50MB for web games, adjust as needed)
notes.enforce: Set to false to warn only without blocking builds
notes.enabled: Set to false to completely disable the bundle size guard
